This repository contains documents and materials for a model online permit and monitoring system under the Nagoya Protocol. 

Documents are made available as html, word, pdf and markdown along with accompanying presentations and images.

To download pdf and word versions navigate to the file (see sections) press on the name and then press Raw. The file will then download. The reason
